title: OpenMandriva Lx 5.0 Is Out as the Last KDE Plasma 5 Release, Powered by Linux 6.6 LTS
description:
OpenMandriva Lx 5.0 distribution is now available for download as the last major OpenMandriva Lx release featuring the KDE Plasma 5 desktop environment.

The post OpenMandriva Lx 5.0 Is Out as the Last KDE Plasma 5 Release, Powered by Linux 6.6 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: TUXEDO Sirius 16 Unveiled as TUXEDO’s First All-AMD Linux Gaming Laptop
description:
TUXEDO Sirius 16 announced as TUXEDO Computers' first all-AMD Linux gaming laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS and AMD Radeon RX 7600M XT.

The post TUXEDO Sirius 16 Unveiled as TUXEDO’s First All-AMD Linux Gaming Laptop appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
